metadata.Title: CVE-2021-0941 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In bpf_skb_change_head of filter.c, there is a possible out of bounds readdue to a use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilegewith System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-154177719References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
